text: Andrei Socaci (born 19 June 1966) is a retired Romanian weightlifter. After winning a silver medal at the 1984 Olympics as a lightweight he moved up to the middleweight division and won nine medals at the world and European championships between 1985 and 1992, including the European title in 1991. After retiring from competition he stayed as a coach with his last club CS Dinamo București. == References == == External links == * * * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic weightlifters of Romania Category:Weightlifters at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Romania Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:European Weightlifting Championships medalists Category:World Weightlifting Championships medalists Category:Romanian male weightlifters
title: Andrei Socaci
